module.name: Extension Routes
module.description: COMMERCIAL MODULE, REQUIRES A LICENSE. Allows the explicit exclusion/inclusion of extensions for each route, including calls forwarded or followme-ed from the extension
module.changelog: *12.0.7* Final fixes for zending issues *12.0.6* FREEPBX-7531 fixed in FreePBX 12 *12.0.4* Fix time-of-day issues *12.0.3* Add Class of Service integration. *12.0.1* Rewrite to work with Class of Service module. *2.11.0.4* Enable access from Class of Service 2.11.0.3 Workaround for PHP bug where array keys that contain numbers beginning with zero are converted to integers. This causes issues if you have extension numbers starting with zero 2.11.0.1 #6753 mark outbound calls as EXTERNAL so that CID Cnum ALias field is not used, #6755 Duplicate routes works with Extension Routing now 2.11.0.1 #6696 avoid AstDB corruption 2.11.0.0 Bump for 2.11 2.10.0.7 Add check/uncheck all checkbox to extensions page 2.10.0.6 Fix bug with new routes not allowing extensions by default 2.10.0.5 Add dependency on framework version 2.10.1.2 2.10.0.4 Fix JS sizing code 2.10.0.2 Fix JS for adding inputs 2.10.0.1 Packaging of ver 2.10.0.1 *2.10.0.0* First Implementation
